msg.msgText:
A "LDAP" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create LDAP help imaserver create LDAP "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create LDAP "URL=ldap://127.0.0.1:389" "BaseDN=o=company" "UserSuffix=ou=users,o=company" "GroupSuffix=ou=groups,o=company" "UserIdMap=*:uid" "GroupIdMap=ou=*:cn" "GroupMemberIdMap=member"
Configuration items for "LDAP" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
